mapper.insert: insert into g_categ_busi (CATY_BUSI_ID, BUSINESS_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PARENT_CATEG_ID) values (#{catyBusiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentCategId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
